articles.description: A calorie deficit is most important for weight loss, which you can do without keto. Carbs provide fuel and fiber, nutritionist Rhiannon Lambert said.
articles.content:
Dear Rachel,
I have been doing keto on and off for years. I found that at times it could be great for weight loss (my lowest weight was 117lbs), but other times I would bake too many keto treats and… [+5604 chars]

articles.title: Babies Are Dying of Syphilis. It’s 100% Preventable. - ProPublica
articles.description: The United States’ inability to curb a treatable sexually transmitted disease shows the failures of a cash-strapped public health system. Increasingly, newborns are paying the price.
